timeline.bodyText:
Doesn't need to be updated, but I guess the license checker asked you to do this.
@kurtisvg this should pass.
timeline.author: lesv
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,5 +1,6 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <!--
-~ Copyright (c) 2013 Google Inc.
+~ Copyright (c) 2020 Google LLC

replies.bodyText: Since I re-wrote most of this sample, would it be ok to update this?
replies.author: averikitsch

timeline.bodyText: Is app.deploy.projectId really required?  I thought you would just use GCLOUD_CONFIG
timeline.author: lesv
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -84,7 +84,7 @@ These settings should be revisited for production use.
 
 ## Deploy to App Engine flexible environment
 
-1. `mvn appengine:deploy`
+1. `mvn clean package appengine:deploy -Dapp.deploy.projectId=projectId`

replies.bodyText: Project Id is required. I'm having the user pass it in as an arg instead of changing the pom file.
replies.author: averikitsch

timeline.bodyText:
I think this is supposed to be for Project_ID?
https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/app-maven-plugin/blob/master/USER_GUIDE.md#deploy
timeline.author: lesv

timeline.message: Undo license changes and add note about plugin
